changeSet.author: fabien (manual)
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO storage_file (path, name, content_type, size, provider) SELECT url_dossier_pdf_document, url_dossier_pdf_document, 'application/pdf', 0, 'OVH' FROM apartment_sharing WHERE url_dossier_pdf_document is not null OR url_dossier_pdf_document <> '';

changeSet.author: fabien (manual)
changeSet.sql: UPDATE apartment_sharing SET pdf_dossier_file_id = st.id FROM storage_file as st WHERE (url_dossier_pdf_document is not null OR url_dossier_pdf_document <> '') AND pdf_dossier_file_id is null AND dossier_pdf_document_status = 'COMPLETED' AND apartment_sharing.url_dossier_pdf_document = st.path;
